search.js: document.querySelectorAll('form[action=login\\.php]').length == 0 || alert('Not Logged In'); var ee = document.querySelectorAll('a.tLink'); for(var i = 0; i < ee.length; i++) {  var e  = ee[i];  var href = e.getAttribute('href');  href = 'http://pornolab.net/forum/' + href;  e.setAttribute('href', href);}
